paper_abstract: This paper describes the GEOMI system, a visual analysis tool for the visualisation and analysis of large and complex networks. GEOMI provides a collection of network analysis methods, graph layout algorithms and several graph navigation and interaction methods. GEOMI is part of a new generation of visual analysis tools combining graph visualisation techniques with network analysis methods. GEOMI is available from http://www.cs.usyd.edu.au/similar to visual/valacon/geomi/.
